trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint" /> event.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> event occurs before a row is painted on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>上繪製一個資料列之前，就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> enables you to manually adjust the appearance of the row before any of the cells in the row are painted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> 可讓您在任何資料列中儲存格繪製之前手動調整資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to customize the row, such as to produce a row where the content of one column spans multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 這非常有用，如果您想要自訂資料列，例如產生其中一個資料行的內容跨越多個資料行的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Use the properties in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs> to get the settings of the row without directly accessing the row in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>取得資料列的設定，而不需要直接存取中的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> event to draw a custom background for selected cells.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>事件，以繪製自訂背景為選取的資料格。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that owns the row that is being painted.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be painted.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that contains the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that is being painted.
The row index of the cell that is being painted.
A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that specifies the state of the row.
An error message that is associated with the row.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that contains formatting and style information about the row.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate whether the current row is the first row currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

<see langword="true" /> to indicate whether the current row is the last row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> property set to <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs" /> class.
<paramref name="dataGridView" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="graphics" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="inheritedRowStyle" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be repainted.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />所代表的區域<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />，需要重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> property represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A>屬性代表的區域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，需要重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window and then uncovers it, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果使用者涵蓋整個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>與另一個視窗，然後發現，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A>代表整個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> and then uncovers it, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者涵蓋的範圍縮小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，然後發現，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A>表示所涵蓋的小型區域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the focus area.

<see langword="true" /> to use the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" /> property to determine the color of the focus rectangle; <see langword="false" /> to use the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" />.
Draws the focus rectangle around the specified bounds.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> method when you draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and its cells' contents yourself.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A>方法，當您繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>和其儲存格內容自己。

trans-unit.source: If you manually paint the entire row and its cells' contents, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以手動方式繪製整個資料列和資料格的內容，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> events do not occur.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>事件不會發生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> method to draw a focus around the visible cells of the row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A>方法的資料列可見的資料格周圍繪製焦點。

trans-unit.source: The code actually uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which is nearly identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> method of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼實際使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，幾乎完全相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control minus one.
Gets a string that represents an error message for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
A string that represents an error message for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表目前的錯誤訊息<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> property is the same as the current row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.ErrorText%2A>屬性等同於目前的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />用來繪製目前<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods that are useful for custom drawing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別會提供屬性和方法，可用於自訂繪圖。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to paint the custom background.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A>屬性，以繪製自訂背景。

trans-unit.source: The variable, `e`, is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 變數， `e`，屬於類型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style applied to the row.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that contains the cell style currently applied to the row.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> ，其中包含目前套用至資料列的儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> property contains the same values as the row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A>屬性包含的資料列相同的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Directly accessing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> can affect performance.
trans-unit.target: 直接存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>可能會影響效能。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> event to avoid unsharing the row and maintain optimal performance.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>可避免取消共用該資料列，並維持最佳效能的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A>屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Although you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> property, the new settings will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>透過擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A>屬性，新的設定沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A> property to paint a custom background for the selected row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.InheritedRowStyle%2A>屬性來繪製所選取的資料列的自訂背景。

trans-unit.source: The variable, `e`, is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 變數， `e`，屬於類型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row is the first row currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the row being painted is currently the first row displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果正在繪製的資料列是目前顯示在第一個資料列<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row is the last visible row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

<see langword="true" /> if the row being painted is currently the last row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that has the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" /> property set to <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果正在繪製的資料列目前是中的最後一個資料列<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />具有<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible" />屬性設定為<see langword="true" />，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> to be painted.
A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> values specifying the parts to paint.
Paints the specified cell parts for the area in the specified bounds.

<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control minus one.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> to be painted.

<see langword="true" /> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" />; <see langword="false" /> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" />.
Paints the cell backgrounds for the area in the specified bounds.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> method when you draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and its cells' contents yourself.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A>方法，當您繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>和其儲存格內容自己。

trans-unit.source: If you manually paint the entire row and its cells' contents, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以手動方式繪製整個資料列和資料格的內容，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> events do not occur.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>事件不會發生。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control minus one.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> to be painted.
Paints the cell contents for the area in the specified bounds.

<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control minus one.
Paints the row header of the current row.

<see langword="true" /> to paint the row header with the color of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle" />; <see langword="false" /> to paint the row header with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle" /> property.
Paints the entire row header of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> method when you draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and its cells' contents yourself.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A>方法，當您繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>和其儲存格內容自己。

trans-unit.source: If you manually paint the entire row and its cells' contents, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以手動方式繪製整個資料列和資料格的內容，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> events do not occur.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>事件不會發生。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control minus one.
A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> values specifying the parts to paint.
Paints the specified parts of the row header of the current row.

<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control minus one.
The cell parts that are to be painted.
A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> values specifying the parts to be painted.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" />值，指定要繪製的部分。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> values.
Get the bounds of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> ，代表目前的界限<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.RowBounds%2A> property is the same as the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.RowBounds%2A>屬性是相同的寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: To get the width of the columns in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnsWidth%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得中的資料行的寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnsWidth%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.RowBounds%2A> property to calculate the bounds of the row to paint a custom background.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.RowBounds%2A>屬性來計算要繪製自訂背景的資料列範圍。

trans-unit.source: The variable, `e`, is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 變數， `e`，屬於類型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
The index of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前的索引<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The row index can be used to access the current row within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 資料列索引可以用來存取目前的資料列內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property to access the current row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>屬性來存取目前的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Although the code actually uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, this property is nearly identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然程式碼實際使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，這個屬性是幾乎完全相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The variable, `e`, is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 變數， `e`，屬於類型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that specifies the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" />值，指定的資料列狀態。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to determine whether the row is frozen, read-only, or selected, among other states.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來判斷是否在資料列遭到凍結時，唯讀的或已選取，還有其他狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.State%2A> property to determine whether a row is selected.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.State%2A>屬性來判斷是否已選取一個資料列。

trans-unit.source: If the row is selected, the code paints a custom background.
trans-unit.target: 如果選取的資料列，則程式碼繪製自訂背景。

trans-unit.source: The variable, `e`, is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 變數， `e`，屬於類型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。
